start: hi, what do you want to do?
settings:
/quantity your_number - quantity words
 /transc 1/0 - on/off transcription
/lang en/ru - interface language eng/russ
random_words: which of these words do you know? (new words:
repeat: which of these words do you know? (known words:
add_words:
send me words in this format:
word1 - transcription - translation
word2 - transcription - translation
...
search: here is the word that was found:
search2: what do you want to do with it?
edit:
write a new version of this word in this format:
word - transcription - translation
tags: what do you want to do?
